description: Like the original Collectd Graph Panel (PHP frontend), but then as a Dashboard in Grafana with InfluxDB as a data source. Same colors and styling. Currently supported graphs: - Load - CPU - Memory - Swap - Disk Traffic - Disk Usage - Interface Traffic (Original: https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Collectd_Graph_Panel)

matcher.options: value {aggregate="max", bucket="collectd", host="Strych", rollup_interval="1m", type="memory", type_instance="buffered"}
value {aggregate="max", bucket="collectd", host="Strych", rollup_interval="1m", type="memory", type_instance="cached"}
value {aggregate="max", bucket="collectd", host="Strych", rollup_interval="1m", type="memory", type_instance="free"}
value {aggregate="max", bucket="collectd", host="Strych", rollup_interval="1m", type="memory", type_instance="slab_recl"}
value {aggregate="max", bucket="collectd", host="Strych", rollup_interval="1m", type="memory", type_instance="slab_unrecl"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "collectd/day")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "${agg}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "collectd/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "if_octets")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["instance", "_value"])
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "collectd/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "if_octets")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["instance", "_value"])
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "sum")

//import "date"
//laterTimeStart = date.add(d: 1m, to: v.timeRangeStart)
//earlierTimeStop = date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: "collectd/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] =~ /^${interface}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "if_octets")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> sum()

  |> yield(name: "sum0")


from(bucket: "collectd/day")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> yield(name: "sum1")

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "if_octets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] =~ /^${interface}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "${agg}_rate")
  //|> set(key: "_field", value: "Transmit")

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "if_octets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] =~ /^${interface}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "${agg}_rate")
  //|> set(key: "_field", value: "Receive")

SELECT 8*non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."interface_rx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'if_octets' AND "instance" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT 8*non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."interface_tx" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'if_octets' AND "instance" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "increase")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "mangle-iptmon_tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type_instance"] =~ /^tx_${client:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ipt_bytes")
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["type_instance","_value"])  
  |> group()

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "increase")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "mangle-iptmon_rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type_instance"] =~ /^rx_${client:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ipt_bytes")
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["type_instance","_value"])  
  |> group()

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "${agg}_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "mangle-iptmon_tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type_instance"] =~ /^tx_${client:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ipt_bytes")

from(bucket: "collectd/${rp}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["aggregate"] == "${agg}_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bucket"] == "collectd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${hostname}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "mangle-iptmon_rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type_instance"] =~ /^rx_${client:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ipt_bytes")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r["_field"] == "value",
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r["_field"] == "value",
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "type_instance",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value",
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)
list.label: Client
list.name: client
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "type_instance",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iptables_value",
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "instance",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_rx" and r["host"] =~ /^$hostname$/,
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "collectd/${rp}",
  tag: "instance",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface_rx" and r["host"] =~ /^$hostname$/,
  start: v.timeRangeStart, 
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where $__to-$__from > "start" and $__to - $__from <= "end"
list.label: Retention Policy
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where $__to-$__from > "start" and $__to - $__from <= "end"

title: Collectd Graph Panel Flux
